caption.title: Lag–response for extreme climatic scenarios.
caption.p: Lag–response association for scenarios of (a) SPI-6: exceptionally dry (SPI-6 = −2.5) and exceptionally wet (SPI-6 = 2.5) conditions relative to the baseline (SPI-6 = 0) and (b) Tmin: Tmin = 21.5°C and Tmin = 25.5°C relative to the baseline (Tmin = 20°C), at lags between 0 and 5 months. SPI-6, 6-month Standardised Precipitation Index; Tmin, minimum temperature.
